## Checklist

<!-- Please check all items before submitting -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My code generates no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `dart format .` on my changes
- [ ] I have run `flutter analyze` and addressed all issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (`flutter test`)
- [ ] I have tested on multiple platforms (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have added/updated code examples

### Dependencies

- [ ] My changes require no new dependencies
- [ ] I have added new dependencies and updated pubspec.yaml
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published
